properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:17PM EST until February 10 at 9:42AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service Blacksburg VA has issued
a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...
Virginia...

Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County
Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell...Rockingham...
City of Danville and Pittsylvania Counties
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County
Clinch River Near Richlands affecting Tazewell County
North Fork of the Holston River Near Saltville affecting Smyth County


Two to four inches of rain with locally higher amounts have fallen across
southwest Virginia, northwest North Carolina and southeast West Virginia.
Runoff from this rainfall was producing significant rises on area rivers.

The National Weather Service in Blacksburg Va has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Dan River at South Boston
* from late tonight until Monday morning
* At 4:00 PM Thursday the stage was 13.8 feet and rising.
* Flood Stage is 22.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.

* Forecast...Rise above flood stage around 2:00 AM Friday morning and
continue to rise to near 28.4 feet by early afternoon Saturday. The
river will fall below flood stage late Sunday night.
* Impact...at 29.0 feet...A number of businesses in the Riverdale
area are affected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
